thread.title: Ford hopes China easing will speed up Zotye venture approval

title: Ford hopes China easing will speed up Zotye venture approval
text:
April 25, 2018 / 5:47 AM / Updated 9 minutes ago Ford hopes China easing will speed up Zotye venture approval Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
BEIJING (Reuters) - Ford Motor Co’s ( F.N ) Asia head said on Wednesday he hoped recent Chinese moves to relax ownership rules in the country’s auto market would speed up regulatory approval for its electric vehicle joint venture with local firm Zotye Automobile Co Ltd ( 000980.SZ ). FILE PHOTO: The Ford logo is seen at the New York Auto Show in the Manhattan borough of New York City, New York, U.S., March 29, 2018. REUTERS/Shannon Stapleton 
Asia Pacific President Peter Fleet, speaking at an auto show in Beijing, also said the U.S. carmaker did not expect the rule changes to otherwise significantly impact its strategy in China, the world’s largest auto market. 
China said this month it would scrap a limit on foreign ownership of all automotive ventures by 2022 in a major policy shift to open up the market, with limits on new-energy vehicle (NEV) ventures to be removed this year. Reporting by Aditi Shah; Writing Adam JourdanEditing by Christopher Cushing
